description: They are suspected of stealing more than a dozen diamond-encrusted items from a museum last year.
title: Dresden Green Vault: Three arrested over German diamond heist
title_page: Dresden Green Vault: Three arrested over German diamond heist - BBC News
maintext: The golden coin - deemed irreplaceable - was never recovered and is believed to have been melted or broken down. It is widely acknowledged that the precious items stolen from Dresden, which are impossible to sell legally because of their fame, are likely to have suffered the same fate.
